nl.esciencecenter.esight.examples

Class ESightExampleGLEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.ESightGLEventListener
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.examples.ESightExampleGLEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener

    public class ESightExampleGLEventListener
extends ESightGLEventListener
    Example implementation of a ESightGLEventListener. Renders Axes in different colors to a texture and renders then this texture to the screen.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
